verses.1: Ka ta aw, kong hilhte thei inla, kong gente mangngilh kei in.
verses.2: Pilna thute limtakin ngai inla, na theih tel zawh nadingin hanciam in.
verses.3: Thu theih nading hanciam takpi inla, thu muh nading hahkat takpi in.
verses.4: Ngun, ahih kei leh a kiseel sum manpha zon bangin, hahkatin pilna zong in.
verses.5: Tua hileh, Topa zahtakna thu na thei dinga, Pasian na thei tel ding hi.
verses.6: Bang hang hiam cih leh pilna a pia pa pen Topa hi a, amah pen pilna le siamna a hilh pa ahi hi.
verses.7: Pasian in thuman mite pilna guan a, midikte a hu hi.
verses.8: Amah in thutang mite cing a, amah a itte a kem hi.
verses.9: Tua hileh thuman le thutang a hoih le a kilawm na thei ding hi.
verses.10: Tua ciangin mipil na suak dinga, na pilna hangin nuam na sa ding hi.
verses.11: Na thungaihsut theihna le na thutelna in nangmah hong hu-in,
verses.12: a sia-in na gamtat khak ding hong kem dinga, kampauna tawh buaina a piangsak thei mi,
verses.13: nuntakna manin a nungta lo, mawhna khuamial sungah a gamta,
verses.14: a sia-in gamtat ding nuam a sa, a sia-a gamtatna ah a lungkim mahmah,
verses.15: mi lungsim kawi, muan theih loh ding mite panin nang hong kem ding hi.
verses.16: A pasal tungah citak loin a pasal a nusia, Pasian始 mai ah a kiciamna a mangngilh, kam khum mahmah tawh nangmah zol ding a hanciam, numei paktatte panin hong cing ding hi.
verses.18: Tua nu始 inn ah pai lecin sihna lampi a zui na hi a, misite gam a zuan na hi hi.
verses.19: Tua bang numei tawh mawhna a bawl mite in nuntak nuam neikik ngei lo uh hi.
verses.20: Tua ahih manin mihoihte始 gamtat bangin na gamta dinga, thuman mite始 gamtatna na zui ding hi.
verses.21: Bang hang hiam cih leh mi thuman, miginate, hih i leitungah teengin om ding uh a,
verses.22: ahi zongin Pasian in leitung panin migilote lawn khia-in, singkung zungbawh bangin mawhneite bot khia ding hi.
